Package weka.gui.beans

Interface DataSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataSource, Appender, ClassAssigner, Filter, FlowByExpression, InstanceStreamToBatchMaker, Join, Loader, PredictionAppender, Sorter, SubstringLabeler, SubstringReplacer
public interface DataSource
Interface to something that is capable of being a source for data - either batch or incremental data
Since:
1.0
Version:
$Revision: 8034 $
